Statute.Title: Northern Canada Power Commission Yukon Assets Disposal Authorization Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Aliénation de biens de la Commission d’énergie du Nord canadien situés au Yukon, Loi autorisant l’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1987, c. 9 in force on assent 26.03.87 except ss. 6, 9 and 12 to 16 proclaimed in force 04.06.87 see SI/87‑127
CIF, 1992, c. 40, ss. 50 and 51 in force 15.06.93 see SI/93‑88
